result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

DE refused to sign bond without atty present. arc
Filed by DA's Office. km
Preliminary hearing on April 25, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Samuel E.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

1:04 PM  CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, ADA: Bela Alexander Ballo, DF ATTY: Abrianna Dolfi for today, DF:  Brian Leonard Bos appeared from jail. INCLUDES 22CF228 (INIT), 22CF257 (INIT), 21CF143 (RW), 19CT164 (RW) and 21CF712 (RW). Atty. Dolfi did not have the opportunity to meet with DE. DE makes statement regarding non-appearance at yesterday's jury trial. INIT on 22CF228 and 22CF257: Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Waives reading. ADA Ballo requests separate bonds for each file. Atty. Dolfi makes bond argument. Court sets bond. Court notes Atty. Firkus is public defender appointed on other cases. Atty. Dolfi requests PH within time limits. Court sets PH on 22CF228 and 22CF257 and status conference on remainder of cases. QUASH WARRANTS on 21CF143,19CT164 and 21CF712. Adjourned: 1:22 PM. kma  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 25, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
